title: Full Stack Developer
description: Working in an AGILE team environment to build and test front-end and back-end code for components of a large system. Participating in daily scrum meetings and bi-weekly sprint-planning meetings. Helping solve any problems that may arise during the development process.

title: Software Engineer
description: Working in with a team setting, using AGILE development methodology to build different pieces of software that meets various user requirements proposed by different in-company departments.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Working in with a team setting, using AGILE development methodology to build different pieces of software that meets various user requirements proposed by different in-company departments.

title: Web Developer
description: Finding and procuring customers that are in need of websites or web applications. Maintaining a frequent stream of communication with the customer is kept to ensure that they are satisfied. Building and maintaining custom-made web applications for various customers.

title: Instructor
description: Working with a large team of other instructors to run a technology day / night camp that teaches kids beginner to intermediate skills in programming. Each instructor is responsible for a different class of 8 students each week.

title: Bachelor | Computer Science
description: An emotional 4 year span where I worked two jobs and a side hustle and also studied for classes.
